subject: fix: PWA install button persistence, default filter dates, checkbox alignment
body:
- Persist PWA installed state in localStorage so install button stays
  hidden after installation even when revisiting in browser
- Fix applyUrlState() overwriting default date filters with empty values
  when no URL params are present
- Fix filter dropdown checkbox/text misalignment with flex-shrink and
  explicit sizing
